data.name: SQANTI3
data.description: Tool for the Quality Control of Long-Read Defined Transcriptomes

evidence: "SQANTI3 is the newest version of the SQANTI tool ... aiming to provide the best characterization for your new long read-defined transcriptome."

"SQANTI3 is the first module of the Functional IsoTranscriptomics (FIT) framework" and the wiki includes pages like "Running SQANTI3 quality control", "Running SQANTI3 filter", "Running SQANTI3 rescue", indicating it is run as an analysis application.

"The latest SQANTI3 release ... is version 5.5.4. See our wiki for installation instructions" and the README shows a GitHub Release badge and links to "releases/tag/v5.5.4", indicating distribution via versioned releases.
